contentList.content: Grotesque twistings of alchemy, these bizarre creatures exist in a constant state of pain. Few among them can be counted as rational, thinking creatures.
The fusion of a lion, a snake, and a goat, this vicious creature is the only abomination capable of higher levels of cognition.
Throw yourself to the wind on wings of terror.
They look so healthy. It would be a shame if they weren't. Deal increased damage to those who are at full HP.
Give in to the pride within. Roar aloud, inflicting radiant damage upon those who are shaken by your voice.

The unfortunate splicing of a mortal's spirit with a Baron's flesh. War and conflict drove these mutants to escape their realm to seek shelter among the Astral Plane. They crave independence, and search for meaning for the ways they have been wronged.
Your horns allow you to make unarmed attacks that deal [1].
Your power cannot be detained. Direct your horns towards a target; unarmed attacks with your horns deal [1] on hit.

Immediately after <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dashing</LSTag> on your turn and <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">moving</LSTag> at least [1], you can use your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Spell_Spike">Head Spikes</LSTag> as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag> to attack a creature.

Immediately after you hit a creature with a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">melee attack</LSTag>, you can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Spell_Mutilate">Push</LSTag> the target with your horns [1] away from you. The creature must be no more than one size larger than you.
You can use your bonus action to attempt to push a target with your horns.
